author: Carlos Greer
title: reason Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert split | The
text:
INSIDERS have shared the reason why country superstars Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert called it quits on their marriage.
Rumours that Shelton was cheating plagued the country music couple since almost immediately after their 2011 nuptials, but they would often make light of the stories.
“I just read in a tabloid that our marriage is falling apart!!!” he tweeted in 2013. Lambert responded: “Oh no! Can’t wait to read if we make it or not.”
But there were no jokes this week when the couple announced the end of their marriage: “This is not the future we envisioned. And it is with heavy hearts that we move forward separately. We are real people, with real lives, with real families, friends and colleagues.”
Shelton and Lambert were recently named by Forbes magazine as the third highest-grossing couple in music with $57 million in combined income. That put them behind Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris (146 million) and Beyonce and Jay-Z )$110 million).
Happier times ... Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
But despite them putting on a united front, The New York Post reports that there were issues. “He is eager to have children, but she really enjoys not being tied down. I think they both were off on what the time frame would be,” said one source about the country stars.
Lambert also has a more rigorous touring schedule. “They are never together, and he was wanting them to move close to being together. She really loves her career and touring. She has the ability to go and record albums when she wants and to tour.”
TMZ meanwhile cited multiple sources as saying it was Lambert who had been unfaithful with two men including with country singer Chris Young.
Popular ... Blake Shelton is one of the original and most popular coaches on The Voice. He has won more finals than any of his fellow coaches. Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied
Lambert, 31, put on a brave face last night as she performed at the Cheyenne Frontier Days Festival. When she performed her hit The House That Built Me , a song given to her by The Voice coach, she broke down in tears.
“No one wants to cry in front of 10,000 people,” she said, askingher fans to help her sing the words.
On Monday, a judge signed off on divorce papers, which Shelton had filed two weeks ago.
The couple fell in love in 2005 when they performed a duet of You’re The Reason God Made Oklahoma together.
At the time he was married to long time girlfriend Kaynette Gern, who he wed in 2003 and divorced in 2006.
